title: Papillon Pizzeria Ristorante
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, Italian, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Pizzeria offers a list of vegan pizzas with many creative choices and using alternative sauces instead of the classic tomato sauce. Vegan sauces are made from asparagus, artichoke, and zucchini. Has gluten free pizza as well as wholewheat, kamut, spelt, amaranth, and hemp ones; a vegan tiramisu and vegan tart.
